You're surrounded by soothing energy. You and allies within 60 feet of you are protected from [severe environmental heat and cold](/Rules.aspx?ID=642). If you're legendary in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16), you and those allies are also protected from extreme environmental heat and cold.
